articles.description: Defence stocks have seen renewed positive interest since June 5 as the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) secured sufficient support from key allies and PM Modi returned to power for a third consecutive term.
articles.content: Defence stocks like Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL), Bharat Dynamics (BDL), Bharat Electronics (BEL) and other edged higher on June 28 after the government granted an extension in exemption of customs du… [+3297 chars]
